GratefulDeadConcerts.description: Database containing the concerts of the Grateful Dead band

MovieRatings.description: Database containing Movies classified by Genre and Ratings by Users, by MovieLens (movielens.org). To know more look at: http://pizzaconnections.net/2015/03/27/148/

OpenBeer.description: Database built from http://openbeerdb.com/ containing relationships between Beers, Beweries, Beer types and styles

Whisky.description: Database containing whisky information by Leif Jantzen (https://github.com/ljantzen)

Tolkien-Arda.description: Database containing Tolkien (Middle-earth) related information like Characters, Locations and Events from his different works (http://arda-maps.org)
